agent

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Agent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Innovator, Provider

    public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Agent(int processingPower)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void continueSearch()
      Agent does one more searching step in the current type of searching process, and increases its time stamp by 1.
      int getId()
      Return the agent id, which is also the index in Globals.innovatorList or Globals.providerList.
      long getLocId()
      Return the agent's location id.
      int getProcessingPower()
      Return the agent's processing power.
      float getScore()
      Return the performance of agent's location id.
      Agent.SearchType getSearchType()
      Return the agent's search type.
      boolean hasUnvisitedNeighbour()
      Return true if the set of unvisited neighour locations is not empty.
      void reset()
      Initialize agent's location with a random position, update its corresponding performance, reset time stamp to zero, reset search type to null, reset partner agent information, reset searching information.
      void setId(int id)
      Set agent id, which is the index in Globals.innovatorList or Globals.providerList
      abstract void startNewSearch(Agent.SearchType type)
      Agent starts a new type of searching process and does the first searching step by calling Agent.continueSearch().
      abstract java.lang.String toString() 
      void updateLocIdAndScore(long newLocId)
      Set agent's location id to the given new location id and update agent's performance as well.
      void waitAndDoNothing()
      Agent increases its time stamp by 1.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Agent

        public Agent(int processingPower)
        Create an agent object with the given processing power. There are two subclasses, Innovator and Provider.
        Parameters:
        processingPower - a non-negative integer, which indicates the maximum number of changes to a configuration

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Return the agent id, which is also the index in Globals.innovatorList or Globals.providerList.
        Returns:
        the agent id, which is also the index in Globals.innovatorList or Globals.providerList

      • getProcessingPower

        public int getProcessingPower()
        Return the agent's processing power.
        Returns:
        the agent's processing power

      • getLocId

        public long getLocId()
        Return the agent's location id.
        Returns:
        the agent's location id

      • getScore

        public float getScore()
        Return the performance of agent's location id.
        Returns:
        the performance of agent's location id

      • getSearchType

        public Agent.SearchType getSearchType()
        Return the agent's search type. Innovator: null, M, P, MandP, Magain. Provider: null, Q
        Returns:
        the agent's search type

      • setId

        public void setId(int id)
        Set agent id, which is the index in Globals.innovatorList or Globals.providerList
        Parameters:
        id - an non-negative integer, which is the index in Globals.innovatorList or Globals.providerList

      • updateLocIdAndScore

        public void updateLocIdAndScore(long newLocId)
        Set agent's location id to the given new location id and update agent's performance as well.
        Parameters:
        newLocId - a new location id

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Initialize agent's location with a random position, update its corresponding performance, reset time stamp to zero, reset search type to null, reset partner agent information, reset searching information.

      • hasUnvisitedNeighbour

        public boolean hasUnvisitedNeighbour()
        Return true if the set of unvisited neighour locations is not empty.
        Returns:
        true if the set of unvisited neighour locations is not empty

      • startNewSearch

        public abstract void startNewSearch(Agent.SearchType type)
        Agent starts a new type of searching process and does the first searching step by calling Agent.continueSearch(). Search type of Innovator: M, P, MandP, Magain; search type of Provider: Q.
        Parameters:
        type - a search type: Innovator: M, P, MandP, Magain; Provider: Q

      • continueSearch

        public abstract void continueSearch()
        Agent does one more searching step in the current type of searching process, and increases its time stamp by 1.

      • waitAndDoNothing

        public void waitAndDoNothing()
        Agent increases its time stamp by 1.

      • toString

        public abstract java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
